name: Holy Ship (itch)
description:
In Holy Ship you play a downtrodden pirate trying to save their sinking ship. It's too far along to truly save, so just do your best and enjoy what time you have left as you delay the inevitable! At least you have plenty of rum!

Controls:

 -'W, A, S, D' to move around.  

-'R' to interact.  

-'X' to drop what's in your hand (performing an interact task will auto-drop what's in your hand).

You can patch leaks, pick up bottles and buckets, bail out water, or drink rum. Be careful though you can only hold one thing at a time.
